About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a Web Developer with a vast array of knowledge in many different Front End and Back End languages, responsive frameworks, databases and best code practices. My objective is simply to be the best web developer that I can be and to contribute to the technology industry all that I know and can do. I am dedicated to perfecting my craft by learning from more seasoned developers, remaining humble and continiously making strides to learn all that I can about development.

Freelance (May 2020 - present)

Full Stack Developer

As a Web Developer, I started out by learning python basics, stepped on to Django along with HTML & CSS, making few prototype projects, then developed a CRM tool for my first client. And then went on to learn javascript, built a Twitter clone, learning React and REST API with it. After that I built some complex webapps for clients including a complex Bank Debt Recovery tool, built by combining powers of Django, REST, and React. You can checkout some of my projects in My Work Tab.

EmbedVision (Jan 2019 - April 2020)

Software developer

At EmbedVision I started out as a Trainee, and learned array of skills in both hardware and software domain, including PCB Designing, Etching, Drilling to programming in Assembly Language, C and Embdded C. Later I was promoted as a Software Developer, and developed software for variety of projects ranging from Home automation, smart irrigation system, smart parking, health monitoring to mesh solving robots.
